mapper.select: SELECT REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, OPER_DATE AS operDate, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE AS takePhotoEnable, SUCCESS_COUNT AS successCount, OVERHAUL_COUNT AS overhaulCount, OVERHAUL_RESULT AS overhaulResult, OVERHAUL_UNUSL AS overhaulUnusl, SUBMIT_TARGET_COUNT AS submitTargetCount, SUBMIT_COUNT AS submitCount, PRODUCT_CONDT AS productCondt, TERMINAL_CONDT AS terminalCondt, GROUND_CONDT AS groundCondt, GARBAGE_CONDT AS garbageCondt, CASH_ENVELOPE_CONDT AS cashEnvelopeCondt, POSTER_CONDT AS posterCondt FROM ATMS_SLA_A0

SELECT REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, OPER_DATE AS operDate, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE AS takePhotoEnable, SUCCESS_COUNT AS successCount, OVERHAUL_COUNT AS overhaulCount, OVERHAUL_RESULT AS overhaulResult, OVERHAUL_UNUSL AS overhaulUnusl, SUBMIT_TARGET_COUNT AS submitTargetCount, SUBMIT_COUNT AS submitCount, PRODUCT_CONDT AS productCondt, TERMINAL_CONDT AS terminalCondt, GROUND_CONDT AS groundCondt, GARBAGE_CONDT AS garbageCondt, CASH_ENVELOPE_CONDT AS cashEnvelopeCondt, POSTER_CONDT AS posterCondt FROM ATMS_SLA_A0 WHERE REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_A0 WHERE REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_A0 SET OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, OPER_DATE = #{operDate}, BRANCH_GUBUN = #{branchGubun}, CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE = #{takePhotoEnable}, SUCCESS_COUNT = #{successCount}, OVERHAUL_COUNT = #{overhaulCount}, OVERHAUL_RESULT = #{overhaulResult}, OVERHAUL_UNUSL = #{overhaulUnusl}, SUBMIT_TARGET_COUNT = #{submitTargetCount}, SUBMIT_COUNT = #{submitCount}, PRODUCT_CONDT = #{productCondt}, TERMINAL_CONDT = #{terminalCondt}, GROUND_CONDT = #{groundCondt}, GARBAGE_CONDT = #{garbageCondt}, CASH_ENVELOPE_CONDT = #{cashEnvelopeCondt}, POSTER_CONDT = #{posterCondt} WHERE REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_A0 ( REG_DATETIME, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, OVERHAUL_DATE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_NAME, OPER_DATE, BRANCH_GUBUN, CORP_CODE, TAKE_PHOTO_ENABLE, SUCCESS_COUNT, OVERHAUL_COUNT, OVERHAUL_RESULT, OVERHAUL_UNUSL, SUBMIT_TARGET_COUNT, SUBMIT_COUNT, PRODUCT_CONDT, TERMINAL_CONDT, GROUND_CONDT, GARBAGE_CONDT, CASH_ENVELOPE_CONDT, POSTER_CONDT ) VALUES ( #{regDatetime}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{overhaulDate}, #{branchName}, #{cornerName}, #{operDate}, #{branchGubun}, #{corpCode}, #{takePhotoEnable}, #{successCount}, #{overhaulCount}, #{overhaulResult}, #{overhaulUnusl}, #{submitTargetCount}, #{submitCount}, #{productCondt}, #{terminalCondt}, #{groundCondt}, #{garbageCondt}, #{cashEnvelopeCondt}, #{posterCondt} )
